channel.title: LUMO Cybersecurity Briefs
channel.description: Summarized cybersecurity news and alerts for small business owners.

item.title: Featuring-Call-Exploits-Underway
item.description: The Pwn2Own Berlin competition is underway, featuring top security researchers testing various systems, including an AI category for the first time. High-value targets include NVIDIA Triton Inference Server, Red Hat Enterprise Linux, Microsoft Windows 11, and more. Participants have until May 15th to attempt vulnerability exploits in a bid to win cash prizes and Master of Pwn Points. Act now to protect your business â€” call LUMO today at (928) 277-8369.
